name: Complete project proposal
description: Write and submit the quarterly project proposal for Q1 2026. Include budget estimates, timeline, and resource requirements.

name: Review team performance metrics
description: Analyze Q4 team metrics and prepare comprehensive feedback reports for each team member. Schedule one-on-one meetings.

name: Update API documentation
description: Refresh API documentation and user guides with latest endpoints and examples. Ensure all code samples are working.

name: Schedule team retrospective meeting
description: Plan and schedule next week's team retrospective. Prepare agenda and gather feedback from team members.

name: Set up CI/CD pipeline
description: Configure continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the new microservices. Set up automated testing and deployment workflows.

name: Design UI mockups for new features
description: Create comprehensive UI mockups for the upcoming features. Include mobile and desktop versions. Get stakeholder approval.

name: Test newly implemented features
description: Perform thorough testing of newly implemented features. Write test cases and document any bugs found. Prepare test report.

name: Fix critical bugs in production
description: Address critical bugs reported in production. Prioritize security issues and user-facing problems. Deploy hotfixes.

name: Plan tasks for next sprint
description: Break down epics into user stories and tasks for the next sprint. Estimate effort and assign to team members.

name: Update project dependencies
description: Update all project dependencies to latest stable versions. Test compatibility and fix any breaking changes.

name: Organize project files and documentation
description: Clean up project repository structure. Organize files into proper directories and update documentation index.

name: Prepare quarterly presentation
description: Create presentation slides for quarterly business review. Include metrics, achievements, and roadmap for next quarter.

name: Conduct code review sessions
description: Review pending pull requests and provide constructive feedback. Ensure code quality and adherence to standards.

name: Implement authentication improvements
description: Enhance authentication system with multi-factor authentication support. Improve security and user experience.

name: Optimize database queries
description: Analyze slow database queries and optimize them. Add proper indexes and refactor inefficient queries.
